Minoru Matsui is a scientific designer.
with a Ph.D. in Engineering. Design portfolio.
His doctoral research topic is evolution of design. Do you think that designers are creative? His short answer is no.
The longer answer is that we invent designs randomly, select designs randomly, and transmit designs randomly. He is not the first one to argue so: previous emprical studies can be foundhere,here,hereandhere. However, he showed that throughexperiments in the laboratory, which is a bit of a contribution.To understand the design of his experiments, you first need to ... Meh, just read histhesis.
